p: YM, KK, and HK designed this study. YM conducted all bioinformatic analyses and experiments. YD and MK performed the next-generation sequencing. YM, FM, NSa, YU, YO, TM, HT, NN, NSh, HY, RO-N, RS, RT, FT, TT, KS, HS, KN, JA, and HI collected samples and conducted the Sanger sequencing. YM and HK wrote the manuscript. HS, NO, AR, KK, and HK supervised this study. All authors read and approved the manuscript.
